info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 12 at 3:24PM CDT until April 12 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN BROWN COUNTY... At 323 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Byrds, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... May around 340 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Owens and Thrifty. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
